Glyph Description Name Code Number Code
! Exclamation Mark - !
¡ Inverted Exclamation ¡ ¡

; Semicolon - ;
, Comma - ,
. Period - .
… Horizontal Ellipsis … …
’ Apostrophe - '
* Asterisk - *
† Dagger † -
‡ Double Dagger ‡
‰ Per Mill Sign ‰ -

² Superscript 3 ² ²
³ Superscript 3 ³ ³
¼ One-Fourth Fraction ¼ ¼
½ One-Half Fraction ½ ½
¾ Three-Fourths Fraction ¾ ¾
^ Caret - ^
~ Tilde - ~

’ Right Single Quote ’ -
“ Left Double Quote “ -
” Right Double Quote ” -

„ Double Low-9 Quote „ -
